name: Matt Brunt âœ¨ (@brunty@brunty.social)
summary:
Why do people use full on frameworks?

Because they're sick of having to wire up and bootstrap a fucking PHP session and flash middleware and then find out the middleware stack is in the wrong order and something doesn't work and oh now it needs more configuring...

I want to be productive, not spend my time bootstrapping yet another minimal framework that includes basically nothing.
